snippet: The Nasdaq OMX Group plans to set aside up to $40 million to settle disputes by investors over issues caused by technical glitches in Facebook's initial public offering.
abstract: The Nasdaq OMX Group plans to set aside up to $40 million to settle disputes by investors over issues caused by technical glitches in Facebook's initial public offering.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED and NATHANIEL POPPER

headline.main: Nasdaq Sets Aside $40 Million to Settle Facebook Claims
headline.print_headline: Nasdaq Sets Aside $40 Million for Facebook Claims
